title: The Lusty Argonian Maid, Vol. 1
author: Crassius Curio
description: A scandalous play featuring a maid named Lifts-Her-Tail and her employer.
locations: Common book found in many locations
excerpt: Act IV, Scene III, continued... Lifts-Her-Tail: Certainly not, kind sir! I am here but to clean your chambers.

title: The Book of the Dragonborn
author: Prior Emelene Madrine
description: A comprehensive guide to the history and powers of the Dragonborn.
excerpt: For those who are blessed and burdened with the gift of the dragon's blood, great power awaits...

title: 2920, Last Year of the First Era
author: Carlovac Townway
description: A 12-volume series chronicling the final year of the First Era.
locations: Found in many libraries and bookshelves
excerpt: Morning Star - Book One of 2920. The Year is told in twelve books, each detailing the events of a single month...

title: The Wolf Queen, v1
author: Waughin Jarth
description: The tragic tale of Potema, the Wolf Queen of Solitude.
excerpt: How Potema, later called the Wolf Queen, came to be is a tale of power, betrayal, and dark magic...

title: The Arcane Archer
author: Summerset Shadows
description: A guide to mastering the art of archery with magical enhancements.
excerpt: The true archer does not simply loose arrows, but imbues each shot with intention and power...

title: The Warrior's Charge
author: Hjalmar the Skald
description: Techniques for wielding massive weapons with devastating effect.
excerpt: Let your enemies feel the weight of your steel as you bring down your greatsword with righteous fury...

title: A Dance in Fire, v1
author: Waughin Jarth
description: An adventure story set in Valenwood during a merchant's journey.
excerpt: The streets of Falinesti were alive with commerce and color as our heroes began their fateful journey...

title: The Black Arts On Trial
author: Hannibal Traven
description: A treatise on the ethical use of Conjuration magic.
excerpt: To summon forth the denizens of Oblivion is to walk a dangerous path, yet one that offers great power...

title: Reality & Other Falsehoods
author: Unknown
description: A philosophical exploration of illusion magic and the nature of reality.
excerpt: What is real? When the mind can be bent to perceive falsehood as truth, reality becomes malleable...

title: The Legend of Red Eagle
author: Tredayn Dren
description: The tale of Red Eagle, ancient hero of the Reach.
excerpt: In the time before the Nords came to Skyrim, the Reach was home to a great king named Faolan, later known as Red Eagle...

title: The Doors of Oblivion
author: Seif-ij Hidja
description: Advanced techniques for opening portals to Oblivion.
excerpt: The barriers between Mundus and Oblivion are thinner than most believe, requiring only knowledge and will to breach...

title: Killing - Before You're Killed
author: Eduardo Corvus
excerpt: In battle, hesitation is death. Strike first, strike fast, and you will live to fight another day...

title: Alduin is Real
author: Thromgar Iron-Head
description: A warning about the prophesied return of the World-Eater.
excerpt: Let this be a warning to all who would dismiss the old tales as mere mythology...

title: Catalogue of Armor Enchantments
author: Yvonne Bienne
description: A comprehensive guide to enchanting armor and clothing.
locations: Midden Dark at College of Winterhold
excerpt: The art of imbuing armor with magical properties requires both understanding of the arcane and patience...

title: Songs of Skyrim
author: Giraud Gemane
description: A collection of traditional Nordic songs and ballads.
excerpt: Our hero, our hero, claims a warrior's heart... I tell you, I tell you, the Dragonborn comes...
